column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////The red velvet chorizo were softer than expected
column2: but overall decent. The dip was good too. My family and friends across the board didn't like the rest of the dishes ordered: the roasted chilaquiles
column4: the chicken fried steak. They found the pancake dish too watery from the eggs and didn't like the dryness of meat and the way the breading slid off.
